nodes.text: Polygon Pictures, Inc. is a Japanese digital animation studio, founded in 1983. It produces computer generated animation for various medium: television shows, movies, video games, commercials, websites, smart devices and exhibitions, with major companies like Lucasfilm, Disney or Hasbro as its clients.

The studio took part in the production of the television series Star Wars: The Clone Wars, between 2011 and 2013, and Star Wars Resistance. Outside of the Star Wars universe, the studio is known for its work on the animation of television shows like Transformers: Prime and Tron: Uprising, or video games like Street Fighter V.
